** The various patterns of late gadolinium enhancement (LGE) seen with different types of cardiomyopathies. Typical patterns include transmural, subendocardial (regional and global), epicardial, and midwall LGE. These may differentiate between ischemic (subendocardial and transmural) and nonischemic cardiomyopathies, HOCM, myocarditis, sarcoidosis, and amyloidosis.
